text:
@Mike_Pence @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse You and the Trump staff are fucking incompetent. You downplayed the existence and severity of CoVid-19 until it was able to get a foothold in this nation. 

You're a fucking moron who doesn't care about this nation or this planet. Get the fuck out of my government.
